messages.content: Hello my name is Priyanka Zadhar, my customer ID is 231496 and I am calling you regarding the warranty issue of the product ID 12345. I want help regarding the warranty, so help me.

Our refund policy allows customers to return products within 30 days of purchase. Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive the returned item. To initiate a refund, please contact our customer service team.
